title: Can it handle lol
body:
Hello my friends
I am here to ask for help regarding the graphic card of two computers. One is AMD Radeon 530 with 2 GB dedicated and the other is R7-M440 with 2 GB dedicated. So my question is whether these two computers will be able to run League of Legend smoothly

replies.body: I can't provide anything definitive, the choice is ultimately yours.  What I can do is offer our [recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide to help make a decision best fit for you.

Thanks very much for answer, but unfortunately I am not good with computers and aren't quite sure whether Nvidia GeForce 8800/AMD Radeon HD 5670 is equivalent video card or better/worse than above mention video cards. If somebody could put some light to that I would appreciate it allot.

Best regards 
DSM0305
